title: Can i request my account Perm banned
body: Sick of your rules.. You muted me for no reason with a 3-12 swain in my game who danced and afked in my base... and your right i ripped him a new one for it... No reason im punished and he is not.. So repeat the Title sense you 'Rightholders' think its correct.. I want to be perm banned from game? Can we get this done?

replies.body:
{{champion:267}} If you wish to request your account to be permanently banned you need to send a request into Riot Support.

Boards moderators cannot do this for you.
I see why we post to reddit.. No responses here
